name: TheRuffChallenge
0:
”Alexa, open Ruff Challenge”
”Alexa, begin Ruff Challenge”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ruff challenge
des:
Ruff is a cute little puppy who keeps getting lost in random places. Woof woof!

The Ruff Challenge is an edutainment game for kids that gives them a variety of missions to rescue Ruff and lets them complete their mission by answering questions on a variety of topics such as Science, Math and Social Studies.

With hundreds of questions across several topics, kids can keep coming back for more without getting bored.

To start, just say "Alexa, open Ruff Challenge" or "Alexa, begin Ruff Challenge".

At any time, you can stop the game by saying "Alexa, stop".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
